page.title: 03UPWOOD WINDMILL
page.content:
There is a windmill at the back of Michelle's garden.Lots of people come to look round it.It was built in the year 1832. There is a name plate that can be seen above the doorway.The windmill has been there for 153 years.The weather and woodworm have begun to take over a lot of the floor for about two years. Some of the windows have been rotting so we had to put new ones in.There was a storm in the 1930's and the sails got blown off the windmill. We used to play in the windmill when we were younger. There's a lot of junk kept in it now.
By Bronwyn.
